remarks: Lemma for ~ osumclN .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
osumcllem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
osumcllem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
osumcllem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
osumcllem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
osumcllem.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
osumcllem.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
osumcllem.m $e |- M = ( X .+ { p } ) $.
osumcllem.u $e |- U = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` ( X .+ Y ) ) ) $.
osumcllem7N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A /\ Y C_ A ) /\ ( X C_ ( ._|_ ` Y ) /\ X =/= (/) /\ p e. A ) /\ q e. ( Y i^i M ) ) -> p e. ( X .+ Y ) ) $.
$d .+ q $.
$d ._|_ q $.
$d A q $.
$d K q $.
$d M q $.
$d X q $.
$d Y q $.
$d p q $.
